message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and satisfaction. Given its high quality and unique features, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. I am offering this exclusive item to you at a special introductory price of $125. I look forward to your consideration.

Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm willing to pay a premium for a high-quality product, but I'm on a tight budget. Can you meet me halfway and consider a price of $90?

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I appreciate your budgetary constraints. In light of your offer, I would like to counter with a price of $100. This reflects the value we place on our product and acknowledges your willingness to pay a premium for quality. I hope this revised offer meets within your budget while still allowing us to fairly compensate for the product's value.
